detectors.description:
Reentrancy in StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__5.sol#36-48):
	External calls:
	- fee = calcFee(_from,_to,_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__5.sol#44)
		- fee = FeeManagementLibrary(FeeManagement).calculate(address(this),UNI,_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__5.sol#63)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf[_to] += (_value - fee) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardToken__5.sol#45)
